column1: #Text=But I think I 'll be all right .
#Text=Are we gon na be all right ?
#Text=" Mako says : " Of course we are .
#Text=" Shiro Shinobi says : " What an unbelievable effort here by Korra !
#Text=She 's dodging every element the Wasps throw at her !
#Text=The Avatar finally gains some ground , but with only ten seconds remaining , it might be too little too late !
#Text=" Shiro Shinobi says : " It did n't seem possible , folks , but the Fire Ferrets are headed to the finals !
#Text=" Bolin says : " That , was pretty much the coolest thing I 've ever seen .
#Text=" Mako says : " Thanks for not giving up on us .
#Text=We never would have made it this far without you .
#Text=So ... I know things are confusing right now , but I hope we can still be friends .
